primaryMeaning: First Ten Days Of The Month
meaningMnemonic: What are the <kanji>above</kanji> <kanji>ten days</kanji> of the month? They're the <vocabulary>first ten days of the month</vocabulary>, of course, or even just the <vocabulary>beginning of the month</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
